About Me

Strategic B2B marketer and nonprofit leader with 3+ years of experience in helping mission-driven technology companies launch and grow. Passionate about developing and promoting new technologies that solve social challenges.

When I am not at work, you can find me outside either hiking, running, or studying the neighborhood plants.

If you'd like to get in touch, feel free to send me message on LinkedIn or email me at fiona@techtogether.io.
